1 #include <ros/ros.h>
2 #include <motion_plan/PlanningAction.h>
3 #include <actionlib/client/simple_action_client.h>
4 #include <actionlib/client/terminal_state.h>
5 #include <std_msgs/Float64.h>
6 #include <unistd.h>
7 
8 int main(int argc, char** argv){
9  ros::init(argc, argv, "simple_navigation_goals");
10  ros::NodeHandle nh;
11 
12  actionlib::SimpleActionClient<motion_plan::PlanningAction> ac("/reaching_goal", true);
13 
14  ros::Publisher pub = nh.advertise<std_msgs::Float64>("m2wr/joint1_position_controller/command", 10);
15 
16  //wait for the action server to come up
17  while(!ac.waitForServer(ros::Duration(5.0))){
18  ROS_INFO("Waiting for the move_base action server to come up");
19  }
20 
21  double pos_x[4] = {3.0, 3.0, 0.0, 0.0};
22  double pos_y[4] = {0.0, 3.0, 3.0, 0.0};
23 
24  motion_plan::PlanningGoal goal;
25 
26 
27  for(int i=0;i<4;i++){
28  std_msgs::Float64 angle;
29  angle.data = 0.0;
30  //we'll send a goal to move the robot
31  goal.target_pose.header.frame_id = "base_link";
32  goal.target_pose.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
33 
34  goal.target_pose.pose.position.x = pos_x[i];
35  goal.target_pose.pose.position.y = pos_y[i];
36  goal.target_pose.pose.orientation.w = 0.0;
37 
38  ROS_INFO("Sending goal");
39  ac.sendGoal(goal);
40 
41  ac.waitForResult();
42 
43  if(ac.getState() == actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState::SUCCEEDED)
44  ROS_INFO("Hooray, target reached!");
45  else
46  ROS_INFO("The base failed to reach the target for some reason");
47 
48  ROS_INFO("Rotating camera");
49  while(angle.data<6.27){
50  angle.data = angle.data +0.1;
51  pub.publish(angle);
52  usleep(1000000);
53 
54  }
55  ROS_INFO("Camera rotated");
56 
57 }
58 
59  return 0;
60 }
